pages.title: Improper Wands
pages.text: Hear me out $(playername), this is not what you should be looking for.$(br2) This are the wrong wands to craft. To charge them you need turtle curses. And with them you can take over the world! (in a very wrong way) Let me show you how to get each wand anyway.
The dark wand. Is not capable of making some of the spells that the proper wand can, but instead this wand can make other spells.

pages.title: Dark Advanced Wand
pages.text: The most powerfull dark $(turtlemancer) wand. As powerful as it looks. However, it's not cheap. As the previous one, this one cannot make some of the spells the proper advanced wand can, but can make some others.$(br2)To obtain this wand you have to perform  $(l:rituals/common_rituals#ritual_evil_wand)this ritual$().
